hero.title: Village Project Proposal Management System
hero.subtitle: Digital platform for managing and submitting village project proposals to local municipalities
hero.description: The perfect solution for villages to submit structured project proposals, track their progress, and receive quick approval from local authorities

features.title: Why Choose Our System?
features.subtitle: Everything you need for efficient and transparent project proposal management

easySubmission.title: Easy & Quick Submission
easySubmission.description: Simple and user-friendly interface for submitting project proposals with all required documents and details

tracking.title: Real-Time Tracking
tracking.description: Track your proposal status at every stage - from submission to final approval

verification.title: Quick Verification
verification.description: Streamlined verification process that allows authorities to review and approve proposals quickly and accurately

documentation.title: Document Management
documentation.description: Secure storage of all project-related documents and files in one centralized location

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Direct communication between villages and local authorities for clarifications and updates

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.description: Track statistics, progress reports, and analyze trends of project proposals

step1.title: Submit Project Proposal
step1.description: Fill in project details, upload required documents, and send the proposal to the local municipality

step2.title: Verification Process
step2.description: The local authority reviews the proposal, requests clarifications if needed, and updates the status

step3.title: Get Approved & Start
step3.description: After proposal approval, receive official authorization and begin project execution

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join dozens of villages already using our system to manage project proposals

footer.description: Project proposal management system for villages and local municipalities
